phylo3D.trees
Class TreeNH

java.lang.Object
  phylo3D.trees.Tree
      phylo3D.trees.TreeNH
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TreeNHX
public class TreeNH
extends Tree

Class is a data structure for holding phylogenetic information that is to be output in NH format

Author:
Tim Hughes (Computational Biology Unit - University of Bergen - Norway)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Prints a subtree beneath a specified node

Parameters:
subtreeRootNode - NodeDataNH specifying the root of the subtree

isUseTaxIDAsSeqName
